title: Octet in E-Flat Major, Op. 20
description: for 4 Violins, 2 Violas and 2 Violoncellos. Mendelssohn was 16 when he composed this. At the first public performance, he played the second viola part.I. Allegro moderator, ma con fuocoII. AndanteIII. Scherzo. Allegro leggierissimoIV. Presto
author: Felix Mendelssohn
